name: num::<impl u64>::checked_next_multiple_of

num::<impl u64>::checked_rem.doc:
Checked integer remainder. Computes `self % rhs`, returning `None`
 if `rhs == 0`.

num::<impl u64>::checked_add.doc:
Checked integer addition. Computes `self + rhs`, returning `None`
 if overflow occurred.

option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 325, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U64)) })])

doc:
Calculates the smallest value greater than or equal to `self` that
 is a multiple of `rhs`. Returns `None` if `rhs` is zero or the
 operation would result in overflow.
